featuredProject.sectionDescription: Startup in development where I apply frontend development, SaaS architecture and artificial intelligence
featuredProject.title: Layla — SaaS LegalTech Platform with AI
featuredProject.subtitle: Product Engineer · Frontend Lead · Founder
featuredProject.description: Building from scratch a SaaS LegalTech platform for managing Second Chance Law cases in Spain, automating internal workflows and legal documentation generation through AI.
featuredProject.extendedDescription: Layla is a SaaS LegalTech product aimed at legal sector companies in Spain, designed to centralize and automate the management of Second Chance Law cases. I develop the product entirely from scratch, primarily working on the frontend and user experience, while incorporating SaaS architecture concepts, cloud databases, deployment, and AI services. The project is continuously validated with real users in the legal sector.

responsibilities.design: Product design and development from 0 to 1.
responsibilities.architecture: Frontend architecture and reusable design system.
responsibilities.ai: Integration of AI services for legal documentation generation.
responsibilities.database: Integration with PostgreSQL database on Supabase.
responsibilities.discovery: Product discovery, testing and continuous improvement with real users.
